product_name: Columbia River A.G. Russell Sting Knife
long_description: Hot forged from a solid block of 1050 carbon steel, the virtually indestructible Sting(TM) utility knife epitomizes toughness and simplicity. Precision ground spear point blade features two razor sharp edges and a corrosion-resistant, nonreflective powdercoat finish. Integrated, contoured handle fits nicely in a bare or gloved hand and provides heft and balance. Included Cordura(R) nylon sheath with Zytel(R) plastic liner allows multiple carry positions.
short_description: Hot forged from a solid block of 1050 carbon steel, the virtually indestructible Sting(TM) utility knife epitomizes toughness and simplicity.
